title: Text extraction from marked region of interest without input marker colour
author: Albin Thomas, Prajna Neerchal
description:
This asset is created to extract the region of interest from an image which is marked with a marker. The asset will extract the region of interest and the text within it without the requirement of the marker colour by grayscaling the image.
Here is an example file path that you can use for the asset execution: https://ibm.box.com/s/rh76fygyh8v3vpgm2vegp42ey4yevj56

The input variable for file_path can be extracted clicking on download for the file path, and then inspecting element in your browser to get the download link. This should be your input file_path variable.
